name: 99 Balls

name: A Dance if Fire and Ice
desc: A Dance of Fire and Ice is a strategic board game of ice and fire, where players must navigate the delicate balance of elemental forces to claim victory.

name: A Dark Room
desc: A Dark Room is a minimalist, atmospheric, and challenging indie game where you navigate a dark, mysterious world by clicking on objects to progress through a narrative that unfolds through cryptic messages and puzzles.

name: Among Us
desc: Among Us is a 2018 online multiplayer action social deduction game developed and published by American game studio Innersloth.

name: Ascii Space
desc: In the vast expanse of space, you are a lone astronaut adrift in a cosmic sea of ASCII. Explore procedurally generated galaxies, mine for resources, and build your own space station. But beware, for the void is full of danger, and your survival depends on your wits and your ability to adapt to the harsh realities of space. Will you survive the ASCII void, or will you succumb to the infinite darkness?

desc: Astray

name: Alien Hominid
desc: Take over as the titular hominid, who has to fend off waves of secret agents.

name: Axis Football League
desc: is a fun and fast-paced American Football game in which you can compete in various football matches and leagues.

name: Ball Dodge

name: Basketball stars
desc: Basketball Stars is the ultimate basketball/sports game where you can play as Lebron James, Stephen Curry, Derrick Williams, and more, created by Madpuffers.

name: Basketbros.io
desc: BasketBros is a side-scrolling basketball game in which you compete against formidable opponents.

name: Basket Random
desc: Basketball is here with its most funny and random way. In Basket Random game, try to score a basket by using only one key with different variations from each other!

name: Big Tower Tiny Square
desc: In this platformer, jump over pits of lava and dodge dangerous traps to reach the top of the tower and rescue your stolen pineapple.

name: BitLife
desc: BitLife is a single player life simulation game in which users make decisions based on a series of multiple choice questions. Try to survive as long as you can!

name: Bloons TD4

name: Black Hole Square
desc: Clean up all the other squares in the universe, just tap them and see what happens.

name: BreakLock

name: Bumpy Ball
desc: BumpyBall.io is a fast-paced action/sports multiplayer car soccer game! Join the league and score as many goals as you can with your rocket powered football cars!

name: Breaking the Bank
desc: In this fast-paced game, players take on the role of a bank robber trying to break the bank and escape with as much money as possible.

name: Cars Simulator

name: Chill Radio
desc: Chill Radio: Your go-to destination for relaxing tunes and soothing sounds, designed to help you unwind and de-stress.

name: Climb Racing 3D
desc: Characters, cars and maps are waiting for you in the car racing game full of fun and adventure with colorful visual effects.

name: Cluster Rush
desc: Cluster Rush is a fast-paced, action-packed game where players compete to group and eliminate clusters of the same color. With simple yet challenging gameplay, Cluster Rush will keep you on the edge of your seat!

name: Cookie Clicker
desc: Cookie Clicker is an incremental web-browser game developed by Orteil. The goal of the game is to produce as many cookies as possible.

name: Coreball
desc: Coreball is a fast-paced, high-energy sport that combines elements of basketball, volleyball, and trampolining. Players use a large, inflatable ball and a trampoline to score points by throwing, catching, and volleying the ball in a small, enclosed court. The game is played with two teams of two players each, and the objective is to score points by throwing the ball into the opponent's goal. The game is quick, exciting, and requires skill, strategy, and teamwork to win.

name: Cubes 2048
desc: Cubes 2048.io is an addictive online game that fuses Snake and 2048.

name: Crossy Road
desc: Crossy Road is a retro-arcade-styled game in which the player controls a chicken and a seemingly endless range of animals, in order to get across a busy road.

name: Cut the Rope
desc: Cut the Rope is a physics-based puzzle game. The game revolves around feeding a creature named Om Nom with candy by cutting ropes in a certain manner.

name: Dante
desc: Collect souls in this platformer set in hell.

name: Death Run
desc: Death Run is a fast-paced, high-stakes game where players navigate a challenging obstacle course while avoiding deadly traps and obstacles. With simple controls and a quick pace, Death Run is an adrenaline-fueled experience that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

name: Defly.io

name: Dig This

desc: Drift Hunters is an awesome 3D car driving game in which you score points by drifting various cars. These points earn you money, that you can spend to upgrade your current car or buy a new one. The game stands out because of its realistic drifting physics and its various driving environments.

With realistic graphics and intuitive controls, Euro Soccer provides an immersive and exciting soccer experience for players of all skill levels.

With a unique blend of visual and auditory elements, Synesthesia is an experience unlike any other.

Players must navigate through increasingly complex levels, using their wits and reflexes to overcome obstacles and defeat enemies. With its fast-paced gameplay and colorful graphics, Vex3 is a must-play for fans of platformer games.

name: Vex 4
desc: Vex4 is a challenging and addictive platformer that will test your reflexes and timing skills. With increasingly difficult levels and obstacles, you'll need to be quick on your feet and have lightning-fast reactions to progress. Can you conquer the vexing challenges and reach the end of the game?

name: Vex 5
desc: Vex5 is a fast-paced, action-packed platformer game where players control a futuristic robot named Vex as he navigates through increasingly challenging levels, fighting off enemies and avoiding obstacles to reach the end of each level. With a variety of weapons and abilities at his disposal, Vex must use his skills and quick reflexes to overcome the challenges ahead and defeat the evil forces of the game's villainous organization.

name: Vex6
desc: Vex6 is a challenging and addictive puzzle game that will test your problem-solving skills to the limit. With increasingly complex levels and obstacles, you'll need to think outside the box and use your wits to overcome the challenges ahead. Can you conquer the Vex6 and reach the top of the leaderboards?

desc: Vex7 is a challenging and addictive puzzle-platformer game that requires quick reflexes and strategic thinking. Players must navigate a series of increasingly complex levels, using their wits and reflexes to overcome obstacles and defeat enemies. With its fast-paced gameplay and colorful graphics, Vex7 is a must-play for fans of platformer games.
